languages.text: "Очередной ли? Прежде никто не осмеливался совершать налеты на верхние палубы. Гнев черни раньше не был столь слеп и яростен".
"Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."
languages.original_text: "Очередной ли? Прежде никто не осмеливался совершать налеты на верхние палубы. Гнев черни раньше не был столь слеп и яростен".

traits.locale_text: "Not this time. No one had ever dared to raid the upper decks before. The rage of the rabble had never been so blind and fierce at any time in the past."
"Not this time. No one had ever dared to raid the upper decks before. The rage of the rabble had never been so blind and fierce at any time in the past."
"Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."
"Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."
"Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."
"Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

languages.text: "Diesmal nicht. Noch nie hat es jemand gewagt, die oberen Decks anzugreifen. Noch nie in der Geschichte des Schiffs war der Zorn des Pöbels so blind und ungestüm."
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

traits.locale_text: "Diesmal nicht. Noch nie hat es jemand gewagt, die oberen Decks anzugreifen. Noch nie in der Geschichte des Schiffs war der Zorn des Pöbels so blind und ungestüm."

languages.text: «Esto es distinto. Nadie se había atrevido nunca a atacar las cubiertas superiores. Jamás en toda la historia de esta nave se ha conocido una furia tan ciega y visceral entre la plebe».
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es distinto. Nadie se había atrevido nunca a atacar las cubiertas superiores. Jamás en toda la historia de esta nave se ha conocido una furia tan ciega y visceral entre la plebe».

languages.text: 「今回は違います。今まで誰もじ上層デッキを襲撃する度胸はなかった。この船の歴史上、これほどやみくもで攻撃的な暴徒は初めてです」
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

traits.locale_text: 「今回は違います。今まで誰もじ上層デッキを襲撃する度胸はなかった。この船の歴史上、これほどやみくもで攻撃的な暴徒は初めてです」

languages.text: “这次并非如此，以前从来没有人胆敢袭击上层甲板。在这艘虚空舰的历史上，那群乌合之众的怒火从来没像这样如此盲目、如此汹涌。”
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

traits.locale_text: “这次并非如此，以前从来没有人胆敢袭击上层甲板。在这艘虚空舰的历史上，那群乌合之众的怒火从来没像这样如此盲目、如此汹涌。”

languages.text: « Non, pas cette fois. Personne n'avait encore jamais osé s'en prendre aux ponts supérieurs. Jamais dans toute l'histoire du vaisseau la fureur de la populace n'a atteint un tel niveau de violence. »
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."

traits.locale_text: « Non, pas cette fois. Personne n'avait encore jamais osé s'en prendre aux ponts supérieurs. Jamais dans toute l'histoire du vaisseau la fureur de la populace n'a atteint un tel niveau de violence. »

languages.text: "Bu sefer farklı. Şimdiye kadar kimse üst güvertelere baskın yapmaya cüret etmemişti. Ayaktakımının öfkesi, geminin tarihi boyunca hiç bu kadar körlemesine ve şiddetli olmamıştı."
languages.original_text: "Not this time. No one has ever dared to raid the upper decks before. Never in the ship's history has the fury of the rabble been so blind and fierce."
